it.polimi.se2018.model

Class ToolCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.ToolCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ToolCard1, ToolCard10, ToolCard11, ToolCard12, ToolCard2, ToolCard3, ToolCard4, ToolCard5, ToolCard6, ToolCard7, ToolCard8, ToolCard9

    public abstract class ToolCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class representing a generic ToolCard. All the methods defined in this class can alter the standard rules of the game. The definition provided by default have no actual effect on the rules, each ToolCard extending this class needs to override specific methods. This allows to treat all the cards in the same way and it allows to add and remove new cards without the need of updating all the subclasses.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
